discussion.p: P0492R1 US-74 failed to replace one occurrence of pathstring, in [fs.path.native.obs] p8. It should be changed to native(), as with the other native format observers.
discussion.note: 2017-06-12, Moved to Tentatively Ready after 6 positive votes on c++std-lib

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4659.
